concept.title: 234.005-2 Mission-oriented solicitation.

conbody.p: See 215.101-2 -70(b)(2) for the prohibition on the use of the lowest price technically acceptable source selection process for engineering and manufacturing development of a major defense acquisition program for which budgetary authority is requested beginning in fiscal year 2019.
